articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission Exposes Adventurous Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission Exposes Adventurous Nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released a white paper Friday exposing the adventurous nature of the joint military exercises Ulji Freedom Guardian expanded by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for decades.
					 The white paper branded the joint military exercises as a direct product of the hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and its military strategy.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK assumes the most despicable and most ferocious aggressive nature, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 The main point here is to put the DPRK under their control by force.
					
					 After the Cold War they invented lots of war scenarios to establish military domination over the whole of Korea and steadily modified and supplemented operational plans of all kinds for their materialization.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian which has been staged every year is just an example of the scenarios.
					
					 Ulji Focus Lens joint military exercises which put emphasis on simulation drill on maps were expanded into large-scale war exercises called Ulji Freedom Guardian in 2008 with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces who regard the Korean peninsula as their operational theatre, the puppet forces, all the puppet central and local administrative organs, munitions, civilian enterprises and all human and material resources of south Korea involved.
					
					 After having a confab on offering the puppet forces an "extended deterrence" including nuclear war means and diverse conventional armed forces in June, 2009, the U.S. imperialists staged Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises with a focus on raising the operational commanding capabilities of units to be involved in the attack for aggression on the north under new operational plan in August in the same year.
					
					 In 2010, the U.S. increased its troops participating in the joint military exercises three times compared with the previous year while trumpeting about "countermeasure to the north's attack on warship Cheonan" and brought to the areas around the Korean peninsula huge troops including nuclear carrier attack force and preemptive nuclear attack means.
					
					 After setting 2015 as "year of war" and August when Ulji Freedom Guardian started as "month of starting the war", the U.S. went hell-bent on the joint military drills.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is the largest-ever one simulating an actual war that has been expanded in a phased manner.
					
					 The U.S. dispatches tens or hundreds of troops to other countries and regions for military exercises with various missions.
					
					 The number involved in Ulji Freedom Guardian is several hundred times as compared with them.
					
					 War means involved in Ulji Freedom Guardian also assume extreme adventurous nature.
					
					 By origin, the U.S. imperialists kept it as a top secret to mobilize nuclear war lethal weapons in joint military exercises in the past.
					
					 Today they are openly making public the introduction of nuclear war weapons and their striking power without any hesitation. This proves that their moves for aggression against the DPRK have entered the phase of implementation after going beyond a limit line. 
					
					 Branding Ulji Freedom Guardian as a preemptive nuclear strike exercise that has gone beyond a limit line, the white paper continued:
					
					 Recently the enemies are trumpeting about the theory of preemptive strike premised on "symptom of use of nuclear weapons" and "signs".
					
					 This is a revelation of their sinister ambition to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK by their own "decision" and "judgment" when an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is all directed to realizing this scheme for a preemptive attack.
					
					 It aims at mounting a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK once an opportunity is offered as huge nuclear war troops have already been introduced. Herein lie the danger and adventurous nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					 It is the trite method of the imperialists to describe war as "peace", aggression as "defense" and plunder as "aid".
					
					 In the face of the flurry of censure and denunciation of the aggressive and adventurous nature of the joint military exercises, the enemies have made profound confusing of the right and wrong with such impudent sophism as "regular and open exercises", "normal exercises whose transparency is guaranteed" and "annual defensive drill".
					
					 The enemies talk volumes about "defensive nature" of the joint military drills but, in actuality, brought riffraffs of nine satellite countries to Ulji Freedom Guardian under the pretext of "visit".
					
					 Dancing to the tune of their American master's ballad of "defence" the south Korean puppet forces are trying to create fear of "threat from the north" among the south Korean inhabitants and incite hostility toward the fellow countrymen in a bid to justify the preemptive nuclear attack drill against the DPRK.
					
					 The moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to realize at any cost their scheme for invading the DPRK can never be tolerated.
					
					 If they persistently resort to Ulji Freedom Guardian and other nuclear war exercises against the DPRK, they will face most merciless and miserable end, warned the white paper.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation of Public Health Leaves for Sri Lanka
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation of Public Health Leaves for Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation of public health led by Jang Jun Sang, vice-minister of Public Health, left here on Friday to participate in the 69th the South-East Asia Regional Assembly of the WHO to be held in Sri Lanka.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese President
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Tran Dai Quang , president of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on the 71st anniversary of its founding.
					 The message congratulated him on his reelection as president of the state at the First Session of the 14th National Assembly.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Vietnamese people would achieve greater success in the struggle for building prosperous Vietnam under the guidance of new state leadership led by the president. 
					
					 It wished the president good health and success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Greetings to Vietnamese PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Vietnamese PM
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of greeting to Nguyen Xuan Phuc, prime minister of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, on Friday on the 71st anniversary of its founding.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his responsible work, expressing belief that new progress would be made in the work of the prime minister and the government of Vietnam to build prosperous Vietnam.
					
					 The message also congratulated him on his reelection as prime minister at the First Session of the 14th National Assembly of Vietnam.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of greeting to Pham Binh Minh, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs, on the same day on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian PM
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Youssef Chahed upon his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Tunisia.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the prime minister and the government of Tunisia success in the work for the political stability and economic prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un from Nigerian
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un from Nigerian
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un were presented with gifts by a senator of Nigeria on the Day of Songun.
					 The gifts were handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria by Senator Abudulah Adamu on August 22.

articles.title: Delegation of Young Korean Nationals in China Visit Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegation of Young Korean Nationals in China Visit Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China headed by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and the patriotic careers of his family members in Mangyongdae, the delegation looked around historical mementoes preserved at his old home with much care.
					
					 It also visited the Youth Movement Museum, Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: Italian Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Italian Delegation Leaves for Home
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A delegation of lawmakers from various political parties of Italy headed by Antonio Razzi, secretary general of the Commission for Foreign Affairs of the Senate of Italy, left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Reception Given for Overseas Young Koreans
articles.content:
Reception Given for Overseas Young Koreans
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- There took place at the People's Palace of Culture Friday a reception for overseas young Koreans which participated in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League thanks to the loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of the Korean Youth League in Japan led by Kim Yong Ju, chairman of its Central Standing Committee, and a delegation of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China led by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo, and members of a delegation and visiting group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Jong Yong Won, secretary of the C.C., the youth league, Kim Jin Guk, director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Kim Yong Chol said in a speech that overseas young people who were subject to contempt and maltreatment in the past as members of the stateless nation could emerge a main force of the Korean community in the alien lands thanks to the warm love and trust of the great leaders.
					
					 He noted that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the Juche-oriented youth movement will record a history of eternal victory on the shining road of the great powerful socialist country and the powerful Paektusan nation.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju and Kim Yong Nyo said that they felt highly proud and honored to be overseas young vanguard of Kim Jong Un while taking part in the 9th Congress of the youth league and celebrations.
					
					 They vowed to strengthen the youth organizations into the ranks of the overseas young vanguard boundlessly loyal to Kim Jong Un and as entities strong in ideology and faith of not abandoning the faith of patriotism unto death, upholding the speech made by Kim Jong Un at the congress as an immortal great programme.

articles.title: Joint Art Performance Given by Chongbong Band, State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Joint Art Performance Given by Chongbong Band, State Merited Chorus
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A joint performance was given by the Chongbong Band and the State Merited Chorus at the April 25 House of Culture from Aug. 31 to Sept. 2.
					 Their repertoire included orchestra and male chorus "We Will Go On along the Road of Loyalty", light music "Frontline-Bound Train", female chorus "We Are Successors to Revolution" and song and dance "Make Others Envy Us." 
					
					 The performers made an impressive artistic portrayal of the profound reverence for the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and the ennobling ideological and moral qualities of the service personnel and people following the road of Juche under the leadership of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Female chorus "Our Loyalty Will Never Change," female trio and pangchang "Ardent Longing" and orchestra and male chorus "We Always Follow One Road", the winner of Kim Jong Il Prize, mesmerized the audience as they represented the profound reverence of the service personnel, youth and other people for Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The joint performance was acclaimed by the audience for showing a new phase of music representation through the presentation of a peculiar art form, a combination of Korean-style light music, orchestra, solo and chorus, and singers' unique and refined depiction and rich and solemn voices.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Call for Socialism Emulation
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Call for Socialism Emulation
Anak, September 2 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers of Anak County, South Hwanghae Province met at the Oguk Cooperative Farm on Friday to complete the harvesting and threshing for this year at the right time and at the lightning speed in the spirit of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the meeting were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, Kim Jin Guk, chairman of the South Hwanghae Provincial Rural Economy Committee, Pak Thae Sop, vice-chairman of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, agricultural workers and members of the union in the county.
					
					 A reporter and speakers appealed to the organizations of the union and agricultural workers across the country to dynamically wage a socialist emulation to complete the harvesting and threshing for this year at the right time and at lightning speed, bearing in mind the militant call by the Party for the 200-day campaign of loyalty.

articles.title: Livestock Increases in Sepho Tableland of DPRK
articles.content:
Livestock Increases in Sepho Tableland of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The livestock of good strains steadily increases in the Sepho tableland of the DPRK which is turning into a large-sized stockbreeding base.
					In a few recent years, the number of such grass-eating animals as goats and sheep has reached to more than 100,000 there.
					
					 Steps were taken at breeding farms in the tableland to put the rearing of diverse breed animals on a scientific way and raise their number on a massive way.

articles.title: 4th Sports Contest of Health Workers Closes
articles.content:
4th Sports Contest of Health Workers Closes
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The 4th Sports Contest of Health Workers closed with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Friday.
					 Pyongyang Medical College Hospital of Kim Il Sung University and the Academy of Koryo Medicine came first in the team standings, divided into two groups.
					
					 The closing ceremony was attended by Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and players in the field of public health and teachers and students of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, made a closing address.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Protest against Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Protest against Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The protest group of the Union of Korean Students in Japan staged an action before the U.S. Embassy and the south Korean puppet embassy in Tokyo on Aug. 29 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime of increasing the danger of war through military exercises for aggression in south Korea.
					 The Japanese police prevented them from going to the U.S. embassy by reinforcing armored cars and riot police.
					
					 They shouted slogans condemning the war moves of the U.S. and offered stubborn resistance against police.
					
					 Then the group headed for the south Korean puppet embassy.
					
					 They bitterly condemned the Park Geun Hye group of traitors keen on escalating the confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 They thrust a written protest to the embassy.

articles.title: Great Persons' Feats for Development of NAM
articles.content:
Great Persons' Feats for Development of NAM
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Fifty-five years has passed since the Non-Aligned Movement started its historic advance as a powerful force for independence against imperialism.
					 The history of its smooth development is associated with the devoted efforts of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the cause of human independence.
					
					 Penetrating into the position and role of the NAM in realizing global independence, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il had worked heart and soul to develop this movement.
					
					 In the 1970s when the imperialists intensified their moves to disintegrate the Non-Aligned Movement from within, Kim Il Sung authored "The Non-aligned Movement Is a Mighty Anti-Imperialist Revolutionary Forces of Our Times" and other celebrated works to give a scientific exposition of problems arising in dynamically advancing it as the powerful revolutionary forces in the era of independence.
					
					 He disclosed the imperialists' wicked scheme for weakening and stamping out the NAM and clarified the ways for foiling such attempt.
					
					 The President also conducted his energetic external activities for the strengthening of the NAM and its victorious advance, even touring African countries.
					
					 In June Juche 82 (1993), he made an address "Non-aligned Information Should Contribute to the People's Cause of Independence" at the 4th meeting of information ministers from non-aligned countries held in the DPRK and guided the NAM to preserve its character and purity and enhance its position and role in keeping with the rapidly changed international political situation in the 1990s.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il published "Let Us Strengthen Friendship and Solidarity with the Newly-emergent Countries" and other works to strengthen the unity of the NAM and other anti-imperialist independent forces. He stressed the need to further develop the NAM as the mainstay of the independent forces.
					
					 In his report to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, said that the Non-Aligned Movement should take its proper position and fully discharge its mission as a powerful anti-war, peace-loving force and that the movement should be strengthened for global independence.
					
					 Cherishing the undying feats of the great leaders in their mind, the DPRK people will as ever strive to strengthen the NAM and build an independent, new world.

articles.title: History of U.S. Aggression on Korea
articles.content:
History of U.S. Aggression on Korea
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- It has been 150 years since the U.S. aggressor ship General Sherman was sunk into the River Taedong in Pyongyang.
					 Soon after the end of the Civil War, the U.S. sent the ship to Korea as part of its moves for aggression on Korea.
					
					 With more than 90 armed sailors on board, the ship General Sherman intruded into the estuary of the River Taedong in mid-August 1866, disguised as a merchant vessel.
					
					 While it was sailing up to the Yanggak Islet in Pyongyang, the aggressors sounded the river and landed in its vicinity to rape women and commit other outrages.
					
					 In a talk with the then representative of the administration office of Pyongyang, they demanded their landing in Pyongyang and large amounts of rice, gold, silver and insam (ginseng)
					
					 As their gangster-like demand was refused, they openly committed robbery and killings.
					
					 Enraged at such arrogant acts of the Yankees, inhabitants in the walled city of Pyongyang turned out in a struggle against the aggressors, in response to the call of Kim Ung U, great-grandfather of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 As a result, the ship was engulfed in flames by a fire-attack tactics and was sunk into the river on September 2.
					
					 This was the first time the U.S. suffered a disgraceful defeat in its history of overseas aggression.
					
					 The ship General Sherman incident shows that the U.S. scheme for aggression on Korea was started in vain 150 years ago.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye Regime's Anti-Reunification Paradox
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye Regime's Anti-Reunification Paradox
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Anti-reunification forces that number a handful of south Koreans persist in going against the daily-mounting desire of all Koreans for reunification.
					 The puppet minister of Unification of south Korea at a recent "meeting of the ad hoc committee for improving south-north relations" spouted a load of jargon that it is not the time for dialogue contrary to what happened in the past but only sanctions and pressure are necessary at present. 
					
					 Commenting on this, the political camp of south Korea criticized it, saying the minister seemed to be the minister of National Division and the reason for the "ministry's" existence is shaking to its foundation.
					
					 This reflects the mindset of south Koreans of various circles critical of the Park regime's hideous anti-reunification policy of confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Since she took office she has brought the worst disasters only to the nation through the vicious confrontational racket against the compatriots in the north as she set it as the primary target of "her north policy" to "lead it to changes" through "sanctions and pressure." 
					
					 After making Chongwadae staffed with war maniacs of the military, remnants and descendants of "yusin", she helped the confrontation maniacs hold important posts in the "Ministry of Unification," the diplomatic and unification committees of the "National Assembly," etc. to hurl them into carrying out her policy of division.
					
					 She instructed her hand-raised lackey to shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the last hope of the north-south ties, under the pretext of implementing the "May 24 step," a product of her policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 By appointing her another hand-raised stooge as "vice-minister of Unification," she betrayed her sinister design to use the ministry as a shock force for escalating the confrontation.
					
					 Her venomous confrontation policy made poisonous mushrooms sprout in ministries of the puppet regime to spearhead the campaigns for hamstringing the efforts for reunification and perpetuating the national division.
					
					 Her regime has slandered the DPRK's proposal to hold a joint conference as an "offensive of the united front aimed to stoke discord among southerners" and "camouflaged peace offensive." Moreover, it has remained desperately averse to everything desired and demanded by the south Koreans for improved inter-Korean ties and reunification but zealously welcomed the U.S. deployment of THAAD harmful to the compatriots.
					
					 South Koreans of various circles have turned out in actions for ousting traitor Park who is only adding to the disgrace and crimes against the nation, desperately turning down the goodwill offer of the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Park and her underlings keen on escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north as traitors to the nation are despicable trouble makers that should be thrown overboard as early as possible.
					
					 The dictatorship based on rotten roots can never last long no matter how desperately the old witch of Chongwadae may work to prolong her remaining days.
					
					 The same can be said of the fate of the poisonous mushrooms cultivated by her.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Demonstrating Might of Paektusan Youth Power
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Demonstrating Might of Paektusan Youth Power
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls for demonstrating the might of the Paektusan youth power to the world, flying the flag of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League. 
					 The most glorious era of succession and changes is unfolding on the road of the Korean youth movement, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 The main spirit of the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League is to develop the youth league into the eternal one of the great leaders as required by the new era of the Juche revolution and to let the youth league dynamically demonstrate the might as the advancing group and wing of the Party in the struggle to carry out the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, ushering in the greatest heyday of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement.
					
					 It is a worthwhile struggle for hastening the cause of building the powerful socialist country under the leadership of the Party to usher in the greatest heyday of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement.
					
					 The worthwhile life and honor of heroic youth in the era is to hoist the flag of victory on the eminence at which the Party pointed an arrow of prosperity.
					
					 Thanks to the steadfast will to dynamically advance straight, following the Party with the firm resolution to complete the revolution, bold pluck that trust of Marshal Kim Jong Un helps lift up even the earth and iron-willed youth ranks dashing ahead with patriotic devotion at the maximum speed out of patriotism to build a thriving nation, we will surely bring earlier the final victory.
					
					 The editorial underscores the need to glorify forever the youth league as the eternal one of the great leaders under the uplifted banner of modeling the whole youth league on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 It stresses the need for the young people to become the reliable young vanguard of the WPK to advance straight following the Party, their hearts burning with loyalty, despite rain or snow.
					
					 Only when millions of young people perform feats and dash forward at the speed of Mallima, unprecedented leap forward will be brought about and  the spirit of making ceaseless attack and uninterrupted advance and innovations will run high across the country, it concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Japan's Frantic Arms Buildup
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Japan's Frantic Arms Buildup
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Of late, the Japanese government decided to allot the largest-ever 51.6 billion U.S. dollars to the national defence budget for fiscal 2017. Most of this fabulous budget will go to upgrading PAC-3, developing SM-3 Block 2A and purchasing F-35s.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says: 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries justify their arms buildup under the pretext of coping up with the ballistic rocket "threat" of the DPRK, but it is sheer sophism.
					
					 Japan's ulterior aim is to become a military giant under the pretext of the DPRK's "threat" and launch overseas invasion any moment with forces equipped with modern weapons.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that Japan singled out the DPRK as the first target of its aggression.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mulling invading Korea and advancing into the continent with it as a springboard just as they did in the last century.
					
					 Korea is no longer what it used to be in the past when its people were subject to colonial slavery for the lack of even matchlocks to speak of. The DPRK has emerged as a military power with tremendous military muscle. This is what it would like to warn the Japanese reactionaries of. 
					
					 For Japan to stage a comeback to Korea would lead it to destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Behave with Prudence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Behave with Prudence
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- It is the best way for the U.S. to be prudent and restrain itself, not hurting the dignity and security of the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. can never conceal the aggressive nature of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged in collusion with the south Korean puppet forces, no matter how noisily it may assert its non-provocative nature.
					
					 What matters is that dark clouds of a nuclear war are not hanging over the Korean peninsula only.
					
					 The U.S. pushed the south Korean puppet regime to decide on the deployment of THAAD. Its operational sphere covers the depth of China and Russia.
					
					 The U.S. has openly beefed up its forces in Asia-Pacific to encircle and pressurize its potential rivals in the region, while staging a series of nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK under the pretext of "annual" and "defensive" ones designed to thwart the "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 What the U.S. seeks through the war rehearsal is to verify its plan for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, seize its unchallenged military edge over Russia and China and maintain its hegemonic position in the region. That is why Russia and China are airing unrest and concern   about the on-going military drill.
					
					 The mad-cap joint military drill being staged by the U.S. imperialists with the puppet forces is as foolish and reckless an act as precipitating their self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Scheme to Purchase Latest Anti-Submarine Patrol Planes
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Scheme to Purchase Latest Anti-Submarine Patrol Planes
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Warmongers of the south Korean military are examining the introduction of latest anti-submarine patrol planes aimed to mount attack on the north. This was confirmed by a high-ranking official of the puppet government on August 30.
					 Noting that the north is developing not only SLBM but various attack tactics by use of submarines, the puppet group claimed that if the south purchases four P-8 Poseidons from the U.S., it would help raise efficiency of operation to identify and attack north's submarines.

articles.title: S. Korean Victims of Sexual Slavery Refuse to Receive Humiliating Money of Consolation from Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Victims of Sexual Slavery Refuse to Receive Humiliating Money of Consolation from Japan
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army said they would not receive money paid by Japan under the pretext of consolation, pursuant to the humiliating "agreement", according to CBS of south Korea on August 31.
					 The Japanese government should pay even single won as reparation in token of its admittance to the legal responsibility, they said, declaring they would not receive so-called "humanitarian" money.
					
					 Meanwhile, on August 27 south Korean couple Kim So Gyong and Kim Un Song, who created a girl statue depicting sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army standing outside the Japanese Embassy in Seoul, clarified their stand to continue creating such statues.
					
					 They said they would create such girl statues in order to let people know about the truth of history.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Blocking Joint Conference
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Blocking Joint Conference
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on August 29 denouncing the south Korean puppet group for blocking the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages of the north, the south and abroad for the peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					 Jo Myong Jin, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, condemned the south Korean group of traitors for obstructing the peace and reunification of Korea and blocking the joint conference.
					
					 Ryang Ok Chul, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan said all the officials of the union and Korean women in Japan would turn out as one in the struggle for shattering the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to obstruct reunification and seek national division, and for holding the joint conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, condemned the Park Geun Hye group for deliberately foiling the joint conference.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Urges Wholesale Reexamination of Issue of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Urges Wholesale Reexamination of Issue of THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea issued a statement Thursday in demand of the wholesale reexamination of the issue of THAAD deployment.
					 The "government" is claiming that it can intercept the north's missiles by use of THAAD, but it is well-known that it is hard to expect its military efficiency, said the statement.
					
					 The neighboring countries are regarding the deployment of THAAD in south Korea as access to the U.S.-Japan missile defense system, but only the "government" is denying it, the statement charged.
					
					 THAAD deployment can not be interpreted otherwise than the radar operation and information sharing targeting the neighboring countries, it held.
					
					 It urged the "National Assembly" to form an ad hoc committee in order to reexamine the issue and thoroughly probe the truth behind the undemocratic and obscure decision on THAAD deployment.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Puppet Authorities' Budget Bill
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Puppet Authorities' Budget Bill
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on Thursday chided the authorities for deciding upon the budget bill for next year at the "state council meeting".
					 It is hard to notice the authorities' sense of responsibility for the people's living in the budget bill and understand what is its aim, the editorial deplored, adding:.
					
					 It is not the first time that Park Geun Hye shaped the budget bills in the way of not allocating money for the field requiring investment but letting debts snowball.
					
					 If things are allowed to go on like this, the Park Geun Hye regime will remain the one which has failed to make any contribution in the aspect of financial management.

articles.title: Nature Museum, Central Zoo of DPRK Introduced by U.S. Newspaper
articles.content:
Nature Museum, Central Zoo of DPRK Introduced by U.S. Newspaper
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Nature Museum and the Central Zoo of the DPRK were introduced by the U.S. newspaper San Francisco Chronicle on Aug. 23.
					 Every day thousands of people tour the museum and zoo, it said, adding:
					
					 Those excellent resting places were built thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un's guidance.
					
					 The zoo houses lots of animals such as elephant, giraffe, penguin and monkey.
					
					 You can have intuitive view of the solar system and the history of the change and development of the earth.
					
					 In Pyongyang City, modern skyscrapers are being built under the far-reaching plan of Kim Jong Un and the Mirim Riding Club, the Meari Shooting Gallery, Munsu Water Park, Masikryong Ski Resort and other popular resting places enjoy a good reputation from the Korean people.

articles.title: Russian Figure on DPRK's Expansion in Striking Ability against U.S.
articles.content:
Russian Figure on DPRK's Expansion in Striking Ability against U.S.
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- Vorontsov, chief of a section of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, affirmed that the DPRK expanded the potentials of striking the U.S. at the interview with Interfax on Aug. 27.
					 The DPRK has shown its capability of beating back the foreign aggression forces through the test-fire of the strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile, he said.
					
					 The success in the test-fire demonstrated before the world the military potentials of the country, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK has expanded its realistic potential ability to strike the U.S. together with the proactive defensive ability, he pointed out.
					
					 It has made every possible effort to ensure peace and security in the region, he added.

articles.title: British Body Discloses U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
articles.content:
British Body Discloses U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website on August 17 an article denouncing the U.S. imperialists' moves for a germ warfare.
					 The U.S. has recently been accused by various circles for its decision on the establishment in south Korea of a laboratory for bio-chemical weapons containing virulent germs, the article said, and went on:
					
					 In a "forum on chemical and biological defense plan" in March of 2013 the U.S. imperialists opened to public the fact that the Jupiter Plan is aimed to launch a bio-chemical warfare by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea and anthrax and botulinus germs are the subjects of first-stage experiment being staged at the institutes of the U.S. military bases in Ryongsan, Osan and other areas of south Korea.
					
					 Their distribution of live anthrax germs into the Osan U.S. air force base was disclosed in May last year, stunning the world. This distribution was pursuant to the Jupiter Plan.
					
					 Civic and social organizations and citizens in Pusan area where the plan is enforced are strongly demanding a stop to the building of the laboratory for bio-chemical weapons in the city.
					
					 The situation goes to prove the U.S. imperialists' desperate moves to carry out their thrice-cursed scenario to plunge the Korean nation into the holocaust of a germ warfare.
					
					 The south Korean people will never pardon the treacherous act of Park Geun Hye, maniac escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north, who decided to set up the laboratory, not content with trying to deploy U.S. THAAD into south Korea in a bid to bring nuclear disaster to the nation.

articles.title: Australian Body Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Australian Body Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- The Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture made public a statement on Aug. 26 in denunciation of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 The statement denounced the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills as war drills against the DPRK.
					
					 The on-going war drills with the involvement of weapons of mass destruction not only escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula but gravely threaten the global peace, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The joint military rehearsal assumes more dangerous nature as it was kicked off following the decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. advertised THAAD deployment as the one to "protect" south Korea from the DPRK's "threat", but it is aimed to round off the siege to China in reality.
					
					 The U.S. decision on THAAD deployment in south Korea escalates a serious arms race.
					
					 The DPRK has advanced several reasonable proposals on replacing the armistice agreement with a peace treaty to improve the relations with the U.S., but the U.S. turned down all of them.
					
					 We demand the U.S. stop the provocative war drills, rescind the decision on THAAD deployment and replace the armistice agreement with a peace treaty.

articles.title: DPRK Book Exhibition Held in Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK Book Exhibition Held in Nigeria
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A Korean book exhibition took place at an industrial company in Nigeria on Aug. 26 on the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 On display at the venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books on their greatness and the successes registered by the Korean army and people in building a socialist power.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Norway
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Norway
Pyongyang, September 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show took place in Norway on Aug. 27 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Korean film "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" was shown.
					
					 Present at the events were figures of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea and other masses.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, said that Kim Il Sung led the protracted and arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and thus liberated the country and founded the DPRK, helping the Korean people become the master of the country for the first time in history.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could defeat the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world in the Fatherland Liberation War, win the brilliant victory and turn into the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, he noted.
					
					 Today the DPRK is waging a dynamic struggle for building a socialist power and reunifying the country while meeting all challenges of the imperialist allied forces under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and cause of the great leaders without an inch of deflection, he said, adding: All successes in the DPRK are greatly encouraging the world progressive people.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom revela peligrosidad de Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom revela peligrosidad de Ulji Freedom Guardian
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 2 una carta blanca para revelar el caracter aventurero del simulacro conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea Ulji Freedom Guardian que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos han venido ampliando y fortaleciendo de manera escalonada durante decenios de anos pasados..
					Ulji Freedom Guardian es el producto directo de la brutal politica y la estrategia militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, revela la nota y continua:
					
					La politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC reviste el caracter mas cruel, mas vil y mas atroz.
					
					Lo mas principal de ella es ocupar por via militar la RPDC. 
					
					Despues de la guerra fria, EE.UU. trazo muchos guiones de guerra para establecer la esfera del dominio militar sobre toda Corea y, para este fin, vino rectificando y completando incesantemente los planes operacionales de diversas formas. 
					
					Como un eslabon de tales maniobras, despliega cada ano el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos cambiaron en el ano 2008 el nombre de Ulji Focus Lens, que se realizaba principalmente como simulacro en el mapa, por el Ulji Freedom Guardian y lo amplifico como ensayo de guerra de gran envergadura en que se incorporan sus tropas que toman la Peninsula Coreana como escenario operacional, el ejercito titere y los recursos humanos y materiales del Sur de Corea incluso los organismos administrativos centrales y locales, los consorcios militares y las empresas civiles. 
					
					En junio de 2009, EE.UU. decidio ofrecer a los titeres surcoreanos el "disuasivo ampliado" que abarca los pertrechos de guerra nuclear y los armamentos convencionales de diferentes tipos. Y en agosto del mismo ano, desarrollo el simulacro conjunto Ulji Freedom Guardian dando enfoque a elevar la capacidad de mando operacional de las unidades, que se movilizaran en el ataque contra la RPDC, segun el nuevo plan operacional. 
					
					Bajo el pretexto de las "contramedidas al ataque del Norte contra la corbeta 'Cheonan'" aumento en 2010 tres veces mas, en comparacion con el ano 2009, el numero de sus efectivos participantes en el simulacro e introdujo en los alrededores de la Peninsula Coreana enormes fuerzas armadas incluso el colectivo de portaaviones nucleares y los medios de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					Recurrio a los ejercicios belicos conjuntos fijando el 2015 como "ano de guerra", y agosto, mes en que se inicia Ulji Freedom Guardian, como "mes de comienzo de guerra". 
					
					Ulji Freedom Guardian es el ensayo de guerra real que se amplifica escalonadamente con gran envergadura. 
					
					No pasan decenas o cientos de efectivos que participan en los ejercicios militares que EE.UU. libra con distintos rotulos en otros paises y regiones.
					
					Pero, el numero de uniformados norteamericanos que se incorporan en el Ulji Freedom Guardian llega a cientos de veces. 
					
					Los equipos belicos que se movilizan en este simulacro muestran su peligrosidad. 
					
					En el pasado, EE.UU. trataba como secreto absoluto los pertrechos de guerra nuclear que se movilizan en los ejercicios militares conjuntos. 
					
					Pero, hoy dia, los imperialistas norteamericanos dan a la publicidad sin vacilacion alguna la movilizacion de los pertrechos de guerra nuclear y su capacidad, lo cual evidencia que sus tentativas de agresion a la RPDC ya pasaron el limite y entran en la etapa de ejecucion. 
					
					Ulji Freedom Guardian es el ejercicio de golpe preventivo nuclear que paso el limite.
					
					Ahora, los enemigos preconizan la doctrina de ataque preventivo que tiene como premisa los "indicios de uso de armas nucleares" de la RPDC. 
					
					Esto demuestra el malsano intento de asestar el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC segun su propia "decision" y "juicio" cuando llegue la oportunidad apropiada. 
					
					Ulji Freedom Guardian se enfoca en realizar la artimana de ataque preventivo. 
					
					Describir la guerra como la "paz", la agresion como la "defensa", y el saqueo como la "ayuda", esto es el metodo rutinario de los imperialistas. 
					
					Atemorizados ante las criticas y repudios sobre los ejercicios belicos conjuntos de caracter agresivo y aventurero, los enemigos los describen descaradamente como "entrenamientos regulares y abiertos", "normales y trasparentes" y "anuales de caracter defensivo". 
					
					Hablan tanto del "caracter defensivo" del simulacro conjunto por una parte, y por la otra, introducen bajo el rotulo de "visita" a las gentuallas de los 9 paises perseguidores. 
					
					En adhesion a la sofisteria de "paz" de su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos se desesperan por racionalizar el presente simulacro creando en la poblacion surcoreana el panico por la "amenaza del Norte" y la conciencia hostil a la parte connacional. 
					
					Son intolerables jamas las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos encaminadas a lograr a toda costa la ambicion de agresion a la RPDC. 
					
					Si los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a los entrenamientos de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC incluso Ulji Freedom Guardian, pagaran el precio mas horrible y tragico.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Vietnam por la fiesta nacional
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Vietnam por la fiesta nacional
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 el mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, Tran Dai Quang en ocasion del 71o aniversario de la fundacion de ese pais asiatico.
					En su mensaje, Kim felicito a Tran Dai Quang por su reeleccion como presidente del Estado en el primer periodo de sesiones de la XIV Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular.
					
					Luego, expreso la conviccion de que bajo la direccion de nueva junta directiva estatal encabezada por el presidente, el pueblo vietnamita lograra mayores exitos en la lucha por construir Vietnam prospero.
					
					Y le deseo buena salud y los exitos en sus trabajos responsables.

articles.title: Provincia Hamgyong del Norte sufre danos por inundacion
articles.content:
Provincia Hamgyong del Norte sufre danos por inundacion
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El tifon No.10 ocurrido el 29 de agosto se unio con la depresion atmosferica formada en el noroeste, debido a lo cual hubo fuerte viento y lluvia en todas las regiones de Corea incluyendo la provincia Hamgyong del Norte en el periodo desde el 29 del mes expirado hasta el 2 de septiembre.
					Segun informaciones de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica fueron 320 mm y 290 mm, respectivamente, las precipitaciones caidas entre la hora cero del dia 29 y las 12 del dia 2 de septiembre en los distritos de Kyonghung y Puryong de la provincia Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					Llovieron mas de 150mm en otras localidades incluyendo Onsong, Kyongsong, Kyogwon, Yonsa y Hwadae de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y Taehongdan de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					
					La inundacion creada en la cuenca del rio Tuman dio grandes danos a la ciudad de Hoeryong y los distritos de Musan, Onsong, Kyongwon, Kyonghung y Yonsa, asi como una parte de la ciudad de Rason.
					
					Entre ellos fueron mas danados la ciudad de Hoeryong y los distritos de Musan y Yonsa.
					
					Fueron desaparecidas 15 personas en la ciudad de Hoeryong.
					
					En la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte fueron destruidas de manera total o parcial mas de 17 mil 180 viviendas de mas de 8 670 edificios, y mas de 44 mil hombres perdieron sus casas.
					
					En las regiones damnificadas se realizan los trabajos para estabilizar la vida de los habitantes y resarcir los danos.

articles.title: Victimas de esclavitud sexual rechazan gratificacion de Japon
articles.content:
Victimas de esclavitud sexual rechazan gratificacion de Japon
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Segun la cadena surcoreana CBS del 31 de agosto, las victimas surcoreanas de la esclavitud sexual del ex ejercito japones declararon que no recibiran el dinero que Japon paga bajo la mascara de gratificacion segun el "acuerdo" humillante.
					Dijeron que el gobierno japones debe hacer indemnizacion que reconoce la responsabilidad legal aunque sea un won y declararon que no recibiran el dinero enmascarado "humanitario".
					
					Por otra parte, los esposos Kim So Gyong y Kim Un Song del Sur de Corea quienes elaboraron la estatua de nina esclava sexual del ex ejercito japones erguida ante la embajada japonesa en Seul, expresaron el 27 de agosto la posicion de seguir sus trabajos.
					
					Dijeron que muchas personas expresan la indignacion a la situacion actual en torno al problema de esclavas sexuales de Japon.
					
					Prosiguieron que no solo los surcoreanos, sino tambien los compatriotas en ultramar no contienen la colera a Japon y concluyeron que fabricaran las estatuas de nina para dar a conocer la verdad de la historia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza modernizacion de armamentos de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza modernizacion de armamentos de Japon
Pyongyang, 2 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el gobierno japones decidio asignar 51 mil 600 millones de US$ como presupuesto de defensa nacional para el ano fiscal 2017. 
					La mayoria de estos fondos se desembolsaran para la modernizacion de armamentos como la renovacion de misil interceptor PAC-3, el desarrollo de SM-3 Block 2A y la compra de aviones F-35. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses justifican su aumento armamentista bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza" de cohete balistico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pero esto no pasa de ser una sofisteria gangsteril. 
					
					Revela asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este viernes y continua:
					
					Japon trata de convertirse en una potencia militar y emprender en cualquier momento el camino de agresion a ultramar con las fuerzas armadas dotadas de modernos pertrechos de guerra. 
					
					Lo mas insoslayable es que el pais isleno toma a Corea por su primer blanco de agresion. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses intentan agredir a Corea como en el siglo pasado y avanzar al continente tomandola como trampolin. 
					
					Japon debe tener presente que Corea de hoy no es la de ayer en que se vio obligada a sufrir la vida de esclavitud colonial por no tener ni siquiera los fusiles de mecha, sino es la potencia militar invicta. 
					
					La nueva agresion a Corea llevara a Japon al arruinamiento.
